author: Micah Tyler
comment: In order to get the face to work is to install on phone and then go to play store on watch and install on the watch to. Works perfect. It must a problem aw2 to Auto install.

author: Paul Boychuk
comment: Doesn't work.  Same experience as other user. Google play Open button missing.  No icon in Android Wear.  No icon on desktop.

reply.author: Ceres Software
reply.content: This is a watch face, as in it'll be available on the watch to be set as a watch face. Watch faces cannot be opened from Google play and will not have an icon on the desktop. If you need help with a refund, please send us as email at softwareceres@gmail.com. Thanks

comment: Uninstall it and reninstall it. And not showing up at all. On my Huawei P9. .Does not exist..and NO way around of getting refund on Google play..👍👍

reply.author: Ceres Software
reply.content: This is a watch face not a phone app, as in it'll be available on the watch to be set as a watch face. Watch faces do not have an icon on the phone. If you need help with a refund, please send us as email at softwareceres@gmail.com. Thanks

author: Kevin Hodgson
comment: Does not show on watch or Android wear

author: Raven Walla
comment: I looked in my apps and widgets, but I can't see it. When I did a search it seems to not have been installed. All I have as an option now is "refund". I'd like to install it, though. Any help would be appreciated. Update -Thanks for replying. I will email you.

reply.author: Ceres Software
reply.content: Hello Raven, Could you please uninstall the app from the Play store and then reinstall to see if this fixes the issue. Still waiting for your email at softwareceres@gmail.com.

title: Purchased it, but can't find it.

author: UTV Parts
comment: Nice face, looks and works great. My only complaint is the ambient face a little too simple, I would like a little more detail.  Update: Thanks for listening to me and adding more ambient detail .... perfect!

reply.author: Ceres Software
reply.content: Hello Aaron. As per your suggestion, a detailed ambient mode option has been added. You can select it either from the watch settings or the Android Wear companion app on the phone. Do let us know how it goes. Thanks.

title: Nice face

author: JUSTIN DILLON
comment: This watch face is awesome it is one of few that i have download that actully has a true seperate option for square face that looks real. I love it, it is almost perfect... it just need the second hand to sweep or move in a smooth manner instead of ticking. Let me know when you fix this.

reply.author: Ceres Software
reply.content: Thanks Justin for the wonderful review. The option to have sweep motion for the second hand is coming soon.

author: Peter Hird
comment: Can't find it.  Same as  Raven Walla's comments.  Has a Gremlin appeared?  I have latest versions of Android & Snapdragon hardware so maybe this is why issue only came to the fore this week.

reply.author: Ceres Software
reply.content: Hello Peter, Sorry for the issue. We just tested installation of the watch face from the Play store on a Galaxy S7 & S7 edge. The watch face showed up in less than 30 seconds in the Android Wear app and on the paired LG G, Moto 360 and Huawei watches. Can you email us so that we can work with you on this. Thanks.

author: Russian Bot
comment: Looks sophisticated and clean in active mode, and looks pretty sharp on the 2015 Moto 360 ambient mode. A keeper!

reply.author: Ceres Software
reply.content: Thank you for the wonderful review. Happy new year!

title: This is great!

author: Alfredo Surillo
comment: I could not edit it for the white face. Disappointed.

author: Brad Jones
comment: Crap. Installed it but can't find it.

reply.author: Ceres Software
reply.content: Hello Brad, Sorry about that. If you still can't locate it on your watch or in the Android Wear app, please send the order details to softwareceres@gmail.com and we'll refund it. Thanks

author: Richard Koh
comment: Downloaded it but does not appear in my phone. Why is this so??

reply.author: Ceres Software
reply.content: Hello Richard. It is supposed to appear on your Android watch and the Android Wear app on your phone. Are you not seeing the watch face there? If you need help with a refund, please let us know. Thanks.

author: Gerardo Paje Jr
comment: Works well on my Moto 360 first gen.

reply.author: Ceres Software
reply.content: Thanks Gerardo for the wonderful review.

title: Perfect,  functions and looks great.

author: Joshua Gilbert
comment: 6 is cut off

reply.author: Ceres Software
reply.content: Hello Joshua. As explained in the emails, this is a well advertised feature for moto 360 watches and not an issue. Thanks.

author: Dawit Kim
comment: Hi. I really love this beautiful and simple watch face. I have moto 360 2nd gen and I would like to use the watchface that already accomodates the flat tire of moto 360 but somehow it only have the watchface that if fully rounded and it looks quite weird. Is there anyway I can download the watchface with the one that accomodates the flat tire of the moto 360? please let me know

reply.author: Ceres Software
reply.content: Thank you for the wonderful review Dawit. Please send us an email at softwareceres@gmail.com and let us know whether you own the 42 mm or the 46 mm model. We will update the watch face accordingly.

author: Adrian McKee
comment: I have a moto 360 and a gear live and this watch face looks fantastic on both. It even accommodates the 360s flat tire.
title: Love it

author: Tim Killen
comment: This watch face does not work with the Moto 360. It does not tell you the correct time most of the time. The hands get stuck as if they are on an analog device with mechanical hands that has been dipped in molasses and left out in the sun.  Don't waste your time unless you like being late.  The makers of the app are aware of the problem and offer no solution. Also, they offer no refund. Do not waste your time or money.

reply.author: Ceres Software
reply.content: Sorry that you are having issues with the watch face. Please provide us with the order details and we'll issue you a refund.

title: Watch face does not tell you the time

author: Robert Augustine
comment: Classic styling, simple and elegant. What more is there to say?
title: Reminds me of a wonderful antique watch.

author: John Montgomery
comment: Nice face overall, but the hands could definitely be a bit more refined.

reply.author: Ceres Software
reply.content: Thank you John for the review. Any comment on the moon phase function?
